Process "Invoice Handling"

Phases:
1. Invoice Received (mail, portal, paper)
2. Extract data manually or OCR
3. Validate invoice (supplier, amount, PO number)
4. Approval workflow:
   - up to 5k → Team Lead
   - 5k–50k → Department Head
   - >50k → CFO
5. Post in ERP
6. Archive document
7. Send confirmation to supplier

Roles:
AP clerk, Teamlead, Department Head, CFO, Accountant

Constraints:
- 4-eyes principle mandatory
- Audit trail required
- GDPR compliance required

KPIs:
- avg processing time: 7 days
- error rate: 8%
- invoice backlog: 350 items

Goals:
- reduce avg processing time
- automate validation
- reduce manual touches
